title: Options Type Value
description: Properties specific to the Value option type.

allowedKinds.description: The options that you want configured for the value.

allowLazyCollection.description: A lazy collection allows to have a reference to a collection without actually getting all the records. This option controls if the input collection is a lazy collection, it will keep it as is. If this is set to false it will get all the records belonging to this collection before executing the function

validations.description: The requirements for the given option.
